bioAsHtml: An enthusiast of functional programming constantly discovering how to do things better in languages like Scala. I have developed software using mostly Scala and Java technologies. Currently I am working on reactive Akka based systems for automated warehouses at Ocado Technology.

acceptedTalks.title: Type safe dependency injection in reactive applications
